abstract: Description of a variable step incremental procedure for the solution of nonlinear equations in finite element structural analysis. The proposed procedure is effective in improving the accuracy of the basic incremental technique and in providing, in addition, an accurate  estimate of the discretization error. The proposed approach is highly appropriate for solving problems for which the user has no a priori  estimate of the step size to use.
title: A variable step incremental procedure

publications.publicationName: International Journal for Numerical Methods in Engineering
